segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't even notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger and bigger, and she's standing right in the middle of it, oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, quietly trying to get some cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar on the top shelf, and the stool looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at the boy with excitement, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet and pay attention to the children before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so calm and peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it's too late and the kitchen gets flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter are stacked neatly, but I fear they might get ruined if the water keeps overflowing and someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains on the window are tied back neatly, letting in plenty of light to illuminate the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
